tshad pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ tshad pa rnams ni lam mo// tshad pa rnams ni snang ba'o// tshad pa rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// tshad pa rnams ni

dpung gnyen no// tshad pa rnams ni skyabs so// tshad pa rnams ni mgon no// tshad pa rnams ni ma'o// tshad pa rnams ni pha'o// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni lam mo// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni snang ba'o// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo//
gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dpung gnyen no// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni skyabs so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mgon no// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

rnams ni ma'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni pha'o// rnam par thar ba brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni lam mo// rnam

par thar pa brgyad ni snang ba'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni sgron ma'o// blo'i shes pa'o shes rab bo// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dpung gnyen no// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni skyabs so// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni mgon no// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/
ma'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/ pha'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa dgu ni lam mo// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni snang ba'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni

dpung gnyen no// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni skyabs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mgon no// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni ma'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa dgu ni pha'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa

pa ni lam mo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni snang ba'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo

stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni dpung gnyen no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni skyabs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa ni

mgon no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa ni ma'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa ni pha'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni lam mo// mngon par shes pa rnams ni snang ba'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ sgron ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// mngon

par shes pa rnams ni/ dpung gnyen no// mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ skyabs so// mngon par shes pa rnams ni mgon no// mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni pha'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni lam mo// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni snang ba'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni dpung gnyen

no// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni skyabs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mgon no// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ma'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni pha'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/

gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni lam mo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni snang ba'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dpung gnyen no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni skyabs so// gzungs kyi sgo
rnams ni mgon no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ma'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni pha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni lam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni snang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dpung gnyen no// de bzhin

gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni skyabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni mgon no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni ma'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni pha'o// 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ 'jigs pa bzhi ni lam mo// 'jigs pa bzhi ni lam mo// 'jigs pa bzhi ni snang ba'o// 'jigs pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// 'jigs pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no// 'jigs pa

bzhi ni skyabs so// 'jigs pa bzhi ni mgon no// 'jigs pa bzhi ni ma'o// 'jigs pa bzhi ni pha'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ so so

yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni lam mo// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni snang ba'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no// so so yang dag

par rig pa bzhi ni skyabs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni mgon no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni ma'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni pha'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni lam mo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni snang ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni sgron ma'o// blo'i shes pa'o shes

rab bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni dpung gnyen no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni skyabs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni mgon no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni

ma'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni pha'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam mo// lam gyi rnam pa shes

pa nyid ni snang ba'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dpung gnyen no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni skyabs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mgon no// lam gyi

rnam pa shes pa nyid ni ma'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni pha'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar byed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum

cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du gyur to// rab 'byor byang chub kyi

phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du 'gyur ro//

rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

de dag gi yang yab dang yum du gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar 'di las byung ba ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/ rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar 'dod pas bsdu ba'i

dngos po bzhis sems can rnams yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa ste/ rab 'byor ngas don gyi dbang de mthong bas 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi

phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston pa dang / ma dang pha dang dpung gnyen dang skyabs dang mgon yin no zhes brjod do// rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po gzhan gyi dring 'jog par bya bar 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems

can yongs su smyin par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang la bslab par bya ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan to// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i

mtshan nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan nyid gang yang med do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa mchis pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis chos thams cad yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin kyis dben pa ste/ chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis dben pa'o// chos thams cad ni chos thams cad

kyis stong pa'o// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad yod do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis dben la/ chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang ji ltar mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan

'das dben pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur/ stong pa nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur/ dben pa dang stong pa nyid ni bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon

par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ dben pas ni stong pa nyid la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos gang yang / stong pa nyid kyis kyang dben pa la sems can gang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta

bu na/ bcom ldan 'das bstan pa de'i don bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sems can rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba la

spyod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ sems can rnams ni yun ring po nas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba dben pa yin zhing / bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba stong pa yin mod/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa lags so/ bde bar gshegs pa stong pa lags so// bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya bas sems can rnams kun tu rgyug cing kun tu 'khor ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/

bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi bas sems can rnams kun tu rgyug cing kun tu 'khor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa yod pa yin te/ gang la bdag

tu bya ba pa dang / bdag gir bya ba pa de la 'dzin pa / gang la 'dzin pa pa de la sems can kun tu rgyug cing kun tu 'khor ba med de/ de la kun nas nyon mongs pa gang yang pas/ rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kyi

rnam par byang ba yod pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ gzugs la spyod/ tshor ba la mi spyod/ 'du shes la mi spyod/ 'du byed la spyod/ rnam par shes pa la
spyod do// la spyod/ rna ba la spyod/ sna la mi spyod/ lce la spyod/ lus la spyod/ yid la spyod do// gzugs la spyod/ sgra la spyod/ dri la spyod/ ro la mi spyod/ reg la spyod/ chos la spyod do//

gi rnam par shes pa la spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la spyod/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod do// gi

'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la spyod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la spyod do// gi 'dus te

reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la spyod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba la spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la spyod do// sa'i khams la spyod/ chu'i khams la mi spyod/ khams la spyod/ rlung gi khams la mi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams la spyod/ rnam par shes

pa'i khams la spyod do// ma rig pa la spyod do// 'du byed la spyod/ rnam par shes pa la spyod/ ming dang gzugs la spyod/ skye mched drug la mi spyad/ reg pa la spyod/ tshor ba la spyod/ sred pa la spyod/ len pa la spyod/

srid pa la spyod/ skye ba la spyod/ rga shi la mi spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// nang stong pa nyid la spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ chen po

stong pa nyid la spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ dor ba med pa

stong pa nyid la spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ dngos po pa'i ngo

bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi spyod/ dbang po rnams la spyod/ stobs rnams la mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la

spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi spyod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams la spyod/ tshad med pa rnams la mi spyod/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi spyod/ rnam par

thar pa brgyad la spyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la

spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod/ 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mi spyod/ byams pa chen po la mi spyod/ snying rje chen po la spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod/ rang byang chub la mi spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa

shes pa nyid la spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang spyod pa dang / gang gis spyod pa dang / gang la spyod par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das de

ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis thub pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
cad kyis zil gyis gnon par nus so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa'i gnas zil gyis non pa la gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bgyid pa dang ma bral ba ni zil gyis non pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar

gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi par lus thob par gyur te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gror byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa

ba de yang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar

gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang /

'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te gling bzhi

pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi par lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du

bzhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor

de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang

rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag

par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi par

mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/ bkur sti byas

phu dud byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/

gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang /

rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ rnam par spyod na de'i bsod

nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi par lus thob par gyur te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i

rtsa ba de yang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //

bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu

gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//

rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs

rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/ bkur sti byas/ phu dud byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par

'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems

can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad

pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras

bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de dge ba'i

rtsa ba de yang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang

ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang /

rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi

sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi par lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa

dang / tshad pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong

ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod

de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /

'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal ta stong gi 'jig

rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi par lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la

rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /

lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston cing 'chad pa dang / rnam par

gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi

la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab

tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par

gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams

kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi par lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /

tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu

la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de

yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //

bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu

gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par 'byed pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa de lta bu ni sems can gang la yang de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po

mngon par bsgrub ste/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad gsad par 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar lta ste/ de dag snying rje chen po 'thob bo// de dag rnam par spyod pa des/ rnam par spyod pas dga'

bas rab tu dga' ba dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te/ de dag dga' ba chen po mngon par sgrub bo// de dag mtshan ma de dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ de dag btang snyoms chen po 'thob bo// rab 'byor de ni byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba chen po ste/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang / sems can

thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par spyod pa'i phyir/ su'i gos dang / bsod snyoms

dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad la yongs su spyod pa'i gtong ba dang / sbyin bdag gi sbyin pa dag par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po don yod par khams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lam bstan par 'dod pa dang / snang ba chen po dbyung bar 'dod pa dang / khams gsum gyi btson ran gnas pa'i sems can

rnams yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi bskyed par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rtag tu rgyun 'chad par gnas par bya'o// gal te byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par mi spyod na yang / des yid la bya ba gzhan gyi go skabs da bye ste/ des ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba

nyid kyis nyin mtshan du mi gtong zhing brtson par gnas pa de ltar bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sngon cad nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yod la des dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rnyed par gyur te/ des nor bu rin po che

de rnyed pas dga' ba dang spro ba dang yid bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa las/ des nor bu rin po che de rnyed ma thag tu stor bar gyur na/ de'i rgyus sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par kyi hud bdag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu rin po

che de dang bral bar gyur to zhes nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sha stag rgyun du 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ni rin po che'o snyam du bsams te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che de stor bar yang bya ste/ de ltar na rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bde ba mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

yid la bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ yid la bgyi ba thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
la bgyi ba dang ma bral ba lags/ bral ba la ni byang chub sems dpa' / yid la bgyi ba / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de/

chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas pa yin no//

zhes bya bar shes na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis dben/ rang bzhin gyis stong

pa ste/ de la 'phel ba do// yongs su 'grib pa med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis dben zhing rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par byung zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab

'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par byung yang 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa de/ de bzhin nyid la 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa med do// chos kyi dbyings la 'phel ba

'am yongs su 'grib pa do// yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gcig kyang ma yin gnyis kyang ma yin no// rab 'byor gal te de skad du bshad pa la/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems 'jum mi 'gong / 'jigs sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir ldog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa// rab kyis gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gso ba nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos gang yang dmigs su mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan

'das ci lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ stong pa nyid las gud du stong pa nyid spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'du shes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
ci lags/ rnam par shes pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ sna shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci

lags/ sgra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ro shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das

ci lags/ reg shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci

lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab kyis gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sna'i

'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das ci lags/ gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom

ldan 'das ci lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sa'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci

lags/ chu'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rlung gi khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ nam mkha'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ma rig pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dang gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/

skye mched drug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/

bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sred pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ len pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ srid pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ skye ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rga shi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor

de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ nang stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ phyi stong pa nyid shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chen po stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci

lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa/ stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dor ba med pa/ stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/

yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dbang po lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ stobs lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'phags

pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bsam gtan bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshad pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom

ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par thar pa brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci

lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/

bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci

lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'jigs pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ so so yang dag par

rig pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ snying rje chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan

'das ci lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/

rang byang chub/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang /

skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid

pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang /

ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba

de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa// rab 'byor kyis

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid

dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/

bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa

de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan

'das ci lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de

bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan

'das ci lags/ dbang po lnga'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /

chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/

stobs lnga'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /

chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/

byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos

pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid

pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang /

stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos

kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshad med pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid

bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid

la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang /

snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /

mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
