po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'jigs pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid

dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag

pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid

dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag

pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying

po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'

dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma

mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /

bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid

dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang /

yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang /

rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon

pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid
dang / gso ba nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang /
chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gso ba nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de

bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab

pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin

nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rang byang chub kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor

ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de

bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang /

ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ bcom ldan 'das byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de

khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang khyod kyis ma mthong ba'i chos de dmigs su yod

dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang dmigs su pa de skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma

lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ste/ rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ rab 'byor 'di ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes

bya ste/ lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod de ltar rtsol/ de ltar 'bad pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes/ ye shes chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob

par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/ de'i chos de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos thams cad kyi skye ba nyid gang lags pa de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ skye ba yang ma lags/ skye ba

yang ma lags pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

gal te skye ba yang ma lags/ mi skye ba yang ma lags pa las kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta

bu khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par

rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos kyang bdag gis yang dag par rjes

su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// zhes bya bar sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa de thams cad pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu lnga'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zab pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du blta dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du rtogs par dka' ba'o//

bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag tu ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zhi ba phra ba zhib pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du mkhas shing rig pas rtogs par bgyi ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs

par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin

te/ sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs

par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma yin no// kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag

thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par

gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang la/ glog cing kun chub par byed par gyur te/ bzung zhing bcangs/ blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du

nan tan byed na/ kau shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des brgya'i char yang nye bar 'gro'o// stong gi char yang nye bar 'gro'o// brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang nye bar 'gro'o//

bye ba'i brgya'i char yang nye bar 'gro'o// bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar 'gro'o// bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar 'gro'o// grangs dang cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang

rgyur yang bzod do// de nas dge slong gcig cig gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/

tshad pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di g.yeng ba'i

sems kyis 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par

sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go 'byed pa de dag gis zil gyis non to// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling

gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ de dag thams cad byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pas kyang zil gyis non na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par

byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnon par

'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni lha dang dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i

'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag

thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag

kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro

bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs

mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag ni lha dang dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan par nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad du bstan pa dang mthun par spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun gcad pa'i don du gnas pa'o//

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ring du mi byed pa'o// de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub dang phang bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sems can bying ba rnams gdon par 'dod pa'o// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob pa ste/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa la

slob pa ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'gro bar bya bar sems te nye bar dong zhing 'di skad ces smra'o//

kye skyes bu chen po myur du slobs shig/ skyes bu chen po skyen par slobs shig/ lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyis snying po byang chub tu 'dug ste/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas

blang bar bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhes pa'o zhes zer zhing ston to// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'dod par sems so// de'i drung du bdag kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po

rab mtshe ma yang / mtshe ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' yang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu

rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// tshangs pa mjed kyi bdag po yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems

so// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par
sems so// gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// gnas

gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de ltar spyod pa de'i lus la ni 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa gang ji snyed cig lus la 'byung ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus

la 'byung 'bab ste/ dge slong de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/ 'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/ gi nad dam/

rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad dam/ snying gi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la 'byung 'bab ste/ 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab

mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i

yon tan dang legs pa rjod dam/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'

bo la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa rjod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan dang /

legs pa rjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs so// kun dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

brtson par byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa de'i tshe/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig to can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de thams cad ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i mtha'

mngon du byas te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/ dogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can

mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa las sems gcig tsam 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang / zhum par 'gyur ba dang / spu g.yo bar 'gyur bar skar ma ltung bar gtong zhing 'jigs pa skyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom

ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun

dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ston gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sems mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo // kun dga'

bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ 'on tam ma yin zhes the tsom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar

'ong ngo // kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral na/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos so// ma thos pas shes so// shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bsgom pa ma shes pas de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed de/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa dang bral la/ dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa byed na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i

byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa rjod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag gi grogs yin te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa

smra ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas/ bdag gis grogs su rnyed pa ste/ de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu gnas par

'gyur ba ni/ de bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

ji lta bu la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab ste/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pas ci zhig bya/ bsgoms pa dang / bzung ba dang / blags pa dang / kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya/ ngas kyang de'i gting ma rnyed na/ khyod kyis lta rnyed re skan zhes zer na/ kun dga' bo byang

chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa skyed cing / nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa ma yin no// khyod ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// zhes rlom sems su byed na/ kun

dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom sems skyed na/ kun dga' bo de'i tshe bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang /

spro ba dang nyams bde ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems

dpa'i brjod pa'am/ rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyur na/ de brjod pa'am/ rus brjod pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod cing bdag stod gzhan smod la/ phyir

ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang de la par rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan ma pa de dag gis nyon mongs pa skyed cing bdag stod gzhan smod de/ 'di skad du ji

ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ngo zhes de de ltar gang zag byang

chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la mi snyan par rjod cing smod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gnas ni stongs par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin

rje'i 'jig rten pa dang / kyi yul yang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// zhes ci nas kyang de'i tshig gzung du rung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlob ste/ de'i tshig gzung du rung bas skye bo

mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang / yid ches par bya bar sems te/ de la de dag gis thos sam mthong na/ mthun par spyod par 'gyur te/ de dag gis thos sam mthong nas mthun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob ste/ de dag de bzhin du slob

pa'i tshe de bzhin nyid du slob cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe/ nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las gang dang gang brtsams pa de thams cad mi

'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / kyi yul yang rab tu

'phel bar 'gyur te/ bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ kun dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong nas/ bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal

te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsod cing nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi/ khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ kye rigs kyi bu 'di

ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'thab mo dang 'khrug pa dang rtsod pa dang mtshang 'dru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid kyi lam ma yin te/ de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo// de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo// de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo// de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro//

kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la/ 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di gnyis

ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o// 'di gnyis ka yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams

pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas dga' zhing spro ba dang / tshim zhing yid

bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing / 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/ gal te des rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtang zhe na/ ci tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru bar gyur pa de srid kyi bskal bar go ca bgo bar bya'o// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan ma mchis sam 'on te ma lags kyis bskal pa de snyed kho nar go ca bgo 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /

rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/ kun dga' bo de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang /

'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing snyan du brjod pa dang / 'thabs rtsod de gshe ba dang / snyan par brjod pa byas nas/ phyir 'chags par mdud par 'dzin cing khon tu bzung ste gnas na/ kun dga' bo gang zag de ni 'byung bar nga mi smra ste/

gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btang zhe na/ gdon mi za bar bskal pa de snyed du go ca bgo bar bya'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thabs shing rtsod de gshe ba dang mi snyan

par brjod par gyur na yang / mdud par mi 'dzin la phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin cing / bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bstsal dgos na/ de ltar bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba

dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na/ de ltar bdag gzhan la snyan par smra zhing / phyir zlogs pa ni tshul gyis/ bdag gis de ltar bya'i bdag gis glen pa dang / lkug pa bzhin du bya'o//
bdag gi bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o// sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya dgos

na/ de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyis/ bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o// bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na/ kun dga' bo byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de/ de la ni bdud sdig to can glags lta zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do// kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan

thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par bya'o// de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya'o// 'dug par mi bya'o// gal te 'dug na yang des su la yang gnod sems su mi bya 'khrug par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang bdag gis

'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang / 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la tshul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ sdug bsngal thams

cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/ de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ 'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o// 'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o// 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa

nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong

pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa

dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam

par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa

bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang la bslab par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed do// des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par byas te/ 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston pa

ste/ gal te de 'dres par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na/ de la bdag gis bslab par mi bya'i/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / ma bral bar gnas na/ bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed de/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa mnyam pa yin no//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu drug go// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab kyis/ bcom

ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' pa/ rab nang stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab phyi stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do//

rab phyi nang stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab chen

po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba ni tshor bas stong /

'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong / 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / ni gis stong / rna ba ni rna bas stong / sna ni snas stong / lce ni lces stong / lus ni lus kyis stong / yid ni yid kyis stong / gzugs ni

gzugs kyis stong / sgra ni sgras stong / dri ni dris stong / ro ni ros stong / reg ni reg gis stong / chos ni chos kyis stong / gi rnam par shes pa ni gi rnam par shes pas stong / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong / sna'i rnam par

shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong / gi 'dus te reg pa ni gi

'dus te reg pas stong / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong /

yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / sna'i

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong / chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong / khams ni khams kyis

stong / rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong / nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong / ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong / 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong /

rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / dang gzugs ni dang gzugs kyis stong / skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong / reg pa ni reg pas stong / tshor ba ni tshor bas stong / sred pa ni sred pas stong / len pa ni len pas stong /

srid pa ni srid pas stong / skye ba ni skye bas stong / rga shi ni rga shis stong / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pas stong / nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / chen po stong pa nyid ni

chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong / don dam pa stong po nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong / mtha' las 'das pa

stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid

ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /

dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa

rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong / dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong /

stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong / bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong / tshad pa rnams ni tshad pa rnams kyis stong / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa rnams kyis stong / rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong / rnam par thar

pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pas stong / mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong / ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge

'dzin rnams kyis stong / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong / mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong / so so

yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong / snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras

bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong /

rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis stong / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob

pa lags sam/ tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/

tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes bas par bgyi ba'i slad

du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa

lags sam/ 'du byed skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par

shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/

yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zad

par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'gag par

du slob pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga
'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/

stobs lnga mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dod chags

bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

brgyad pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/

'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/

cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob

na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po 'dod chags dang bral bar bya'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad 'gag par bya ba'i phyir

slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zad par bya

ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu

'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras

bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/

lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa

yin nam/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

du slob pa yin nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa

yin nam/ rang byang chub zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byang chub 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byang

chub 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byung chub mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zad par

bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa

nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin

nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ zhes smras pa de ni ma yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu gcig pa// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/

gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid

gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin

pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba
'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/

'gag par 'gyur ram/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang pa'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/

dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ reg gi de bzhin nyid gang

yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid

gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i

de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lus kyi rnam

par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur

ram/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/

'gag par 'gyur ram/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/

skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/

spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par

'gyur ram/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad

pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ khams

kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ nam mkha'i

khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur

ram/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/

rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur
ram/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par

'gyur ram/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur

ram/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ skye ba'i de bzhin

nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de

bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba

'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de

zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang

yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/

'gag par 'gyur ram/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/

skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de

zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid

kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/

chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/

'gag par 'gyur ram/ pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba

'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ yang dag par spong ba

bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/

dbang po lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ stobs lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/

byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba
'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ bsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ tshad pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gzugs pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang
pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam par thar

pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin

pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin

pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'jigs pa bzhi'i de

bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/

snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/

'gag par 'gyur ram/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang

pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa

'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de

zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

de ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid la slob pa yin/ de bzhin nyid ni zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba de/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la

slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po ni/ phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ stong

pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ don dam pa

stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'dus ma

byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ thog ma

dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po ni/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po ni/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ stobs lnga la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob

pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bsam gtan

bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ tshad pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gzugs pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa

la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ ting nge 'dzin

rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ so so yang dag

par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/

lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rang byang chub la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob

pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob par 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bdud dam bdud kyi
ris kyi lha rnams kyis pham par nus pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du phyir ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bdag gi pha de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mgon du 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la slob pa

yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ rab

'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can

yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum du bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar

slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya'o zhes slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs

rgyun gcad pa'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'chi ba med pa'i sgo dbye bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

ni/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams bstan par bya'o// zhes slob pa yin te/ rab 'byor sems can dma' bas ni bslab pa rgya chen po 'di la bslab par nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'dir slob

pa de ni/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba las gdon par 'dod pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can dmyal bar skye'o// byol song gi skye gnas su skye'o// gshin
rje'i 'jig rten du skye'o// yul mtha' 'khob tu skye'o// yul gcong rong can du mi skye'o// phyag dar pa dang / gdol ba'i rigs su skye'o// zhar bar 'gyur ro// sgur por 'gyur ro// zha bor 'gyur ro// yan
lag skyon can du 'gyur ro// 'on par 'gyur ro// lag pa med par 'gyur ro// dbang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dbang po yongs su tshang zhing dbang po ma tshang bar 'gyur ro// srog gcod par 'gyur ro//
ma byin pa len par 'gyur ro// 'dod pas log par g.yem par 'gyur ro// du smra bar mi 'gyur ro// phra ma can du mi 'gyur ro// zhe gcod pa smra bar mi 'gyur ro// tshig kyal pa can du 'gyur ro// chags
sems can du 'gyur ro// gnod sems can du 'gyur ro// log par lta bar 'gyur ro// 'tsho ba log pas 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ma yin pas yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims ngan pa can du

'gyur ro// tshul khrims ngan pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lha tshe rings po'i nang du skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa
gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha tshe rings por skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta bu de la yod de/ de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las
thabs mkhas pa bstan pa ste/ thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug/ tshad pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug/ gzugs pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang skye'o// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba'i dri ma yongs su dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos

thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang zhig gi yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de

bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems zhum pa cing 'god pa pa de ni/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni chos nyid de shes mthong bas/

sems can de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyod/

don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ rang

bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid la spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod/ dbang po lnga la spyod/ stobs lnga la spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

brgyad pa la spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod/ bsam gtan bzhi la spyod/ tshad pa bzhi la spyod/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa dgu la spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i

stobs bcu la spyod/ 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod/ snying rje chen po la spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod/ lan

cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod/ rang byang chub la spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod de/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang
